name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】#夏色FullBloom ⧸ 夏色まつり誕生ライブ【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [pKc5qSSWJQs]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Final part of the song performance with all guests.
MC section where Matsuri returns to the arena stage and reflects on the live concert before announcing a new song.
Performance of Natsuiro Matsuri's new original song 'ENDLESS FES'.

subtitles.original: 恋してるぞ！
subtitles.english: I love you guys!

subtitles.original: その夏は一度きりだ
subtitles.english: That summer only happens once

subtitles.original: 人生で一度きりだ
subtitles.english: It's a once-in-a-lifetime experience

subtitles.original: だから、いってらー！
subtitles.english: So, have a good one!

subtitles.original: 僕らのラストサマーバケーション
subtitles.english: Our last summer vacation

subtitles.original: というわけで、アリーナに戻ってきましたよ！
subtitles.english: And so, I'm back in the arena!

subtitles.original: ただいまー！
subtitles.english: I'm home!

subtitles.original: はい、今回ですね、夏に始まり、夏で終わる...
subtitles.english: Well, this time, I've put together a setlist...

subtitles.original: ちょっとストーリー感のあるね、セトリにしていますけど、どうでしたか？
subtitles.english: ...that starts and ends in summer, with a bit of a story. How was it?

subtitles.original: 可愛かった？
subtitles.english: Was it cute?

subtitles.original: うわー、ありがとうね！
subtitles.english: Wow, thank you!

subtitles.original: ゲストパートもね、もうみんな一緒に歌ってくれて嬉しかったでございますよ！
subtitles.english: I was so happy that everyone sang along during the guest parts too!

subtitles.original: ちなみに、この配信が終わった後に、メンバー限定のね、
subtitles.english: By the way, after this stream ends, there will be a members-only...

subtitles.original: あのアンコールライブもありますので、ぜひぜひ見に来てくださいね！
subtitles.english: ...encore live, so please come and watch it!

subtitles.original: ダンスもね、あの本編頑張っておりますので、
subtitles.english: I've been working hard on the dancing in the main part, so...

subtitles.original: ちょっと、あの感想とかもたくさんポストしてください！
subtitles.english: ...please post a lot of your thoughts and feedback!

subtitles.original: はい、そして、なんと、次が最後の曲になってしまいます。早いねー！
subtitles.english: And now, surprisingly, the next one will be the last song. It went by so fast!

subtitles.original: はい、最後はなんと... 新曲でございます！やったー！
subtitles.english: The final song is... a new one! Yay!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで...
subtitles.english: Alright then...

subtitles.original: タイトルはこちら！ババン！こちら！『ENDLESS FES』でございます！
subtitles.english: Here's the title! Ta-da! It's "ENDLESS FES"!

subtitles.original: 作曲はですね、みんな大好きFAKE TYPE.さんにお願いをしましたよ！
subtitles.english: I asked everyone's favorite FAKE TYPE. to compose it!

subtitles.original: そしてMV制作はPPPさんでございます！
subtitles.english: And the music video was produced by PPP!

subtitles.original: この後、11月1日の24時にね、リリースされますので、無限に聞いてください！
subtitles.english: It'll be released at midnight on November 1st, so please listen to it on repeat!

subtitles.original: もう無限に聞きたくなる中毒性のある曲でございます。
subtitles.english: It's an addictive song that you'll want to listen to forever.

subtitles.original: なんか、あのまつりすが超リアルなリスになってる、MVで見てみてね！
subtitles.english: The Matsurisu look like super-realistic squirrels in the MV, so check it out!

subtitles.original: はい、そしてMV公開はこの配信の後にプレミア公開がありますので、
subtitles.english: Also, the music video will have a YouTube premiere after this stream,

subtitles.original: そちらもお見逃しなく！よろしくチェックワンツー！
subtitles.english: so don't miss it! Be sure to check it out!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで...
subtitles.english: Alright, well...

subtitles.original: それでは聴いてください、『ENDLESS FES』！
subtitles.english: Now, please listen to "ENDLESS FES"!

subtitles.original:
ENDLESS FES
作詞：TOPHAMHAT-KYO (FAKE TYPE.)
作曲：FAKE TYPE.
編曲：DYES IWASAKI (FAKE TYPE.)
subtitles.english:
ENDLESS FES
Lyrics: TOPHAMHAT-KYO (FAKE TYPE.)
Composition: FAKE TYPE.
Arrangement: DYES IWASAKI (FAKE TYPE.)

subtitles.original: 天を衝いた神輿
subtitles.english: A portable shrine that pierces the heavens

subtitles.original: フェスティバルンルン 奉り候
subtitles.english: A festival full of joy, I humbly offer it

subtitles.original: 文明開化のお通りです 今日も今日とてあしは上機嫌
subtitles.english: Civilization is passing through, today as ever, I'm in high spirits

subtitles.original: Let's party, don't panic こっちおいで電脳ジャンキー
subtitles.english: Let's party, don't panic, come over here, cyber junkies

subtitles.original: WiFi可視化でワイワイはしゃげば 曖昧なことは大体 Whatever
subtitles.english: With visible WiFi, let's make some noise, vague things are mostly "Whatever"

subtitles.original: 接続完了でハイテンション！
subtitles.english: Connection complete, high tension!

subtitles.original: えんやこら上がれ 総員パワー合わせ
subtitles.english: Heave-ho, rise up! Everyone, combine your power

subtitles.original: 銀河すら凌駕する輝きを
subtitles.english: To show a brilliance that even surpasses the galaxy

subtitles.original: ほらいっちょ鳴らせ おまけにもういっちょ鳴らせ
subtitles.english: Come on, ring it once, and once more for good measure

subtitles.original: カルチャーこちゃ混ぜの万華鏡
subtitles.english: A kaleidoscope where cultures are mixed together

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 絶景かな 相も変わらず連綿と豊穣
subtitles.english: Ah, what a magnificent view, as always, continuous and fertile

subtitles.original: ミームはまるで花火の如し 鮮やかに咲き乱れ散っては刻まれる
subtitles.english: Memes are just like fireworks, blooming vividly, scattering, and being engraved

subtitles.original: YOU DIED
subtitles.english: YOU DIED

subtitles.original: 超超超常現象巻き起こせ (Yeah!)
subtitles.english: Cause a super-super-supernatural phenomenon (Yeah!)

subtitles.original: たらればなんていないいないポイ
subtitles.english: Throw away all the "what-ifs" with a poof

subtitles.original: 渾々混沌でも舞い踊れ (Yeah!)
subtitles.english: Dance even through the gushing chaos (Yeah!)

subtitles.original: ないものないエンターテインメント 飛び跳ねろ
subtitles.english: Entertainment that has everything, jump around

subtitles.original: Bounce... baby bounce
subtitles.english: Bounce... baby bounce

subtitles.original: とりあえず朝まで 昼夜問わず繋がっちゃおう
subtitles.english: For now, until morning, let's stay connected day and night

subtitles.original: Oh bounce... baby bounce
subtitles.english: Oh bounce... baby bounce

subtitles.original: 感覚サマーバケーションみたいでしょ？ とびきりの Fun time
subtitles.english: It feels just like a summer vacation, right? An extraordinary Fun time

subtitles.original: 今日もいつもの場所から始まる Superb view
subtitles.english: Today too, a Superb view starts from our usual place

subtitles.original: Look at you 選り取り見取りで供給過多気味
subtitles.english: Look at you, spoilt for choice and a bit oversupplied

subtitles.original: But you said "Give me give me" It's a part of 生きる意味
subtitles.english: But you said "Give me give me", it's a part of the meaning of life

subtitles.original: オレンジ色マーマレード 太陽のよう笑え
subtitles.english: Orange marmalade, smile like the sun

subtitles.original: 宇宙すら越え遥か彼方にも
subtitles.english: Even beyond the universe, to the far reaches of the distance

subtitles.original: ほらいっちょかませ おまけにもういっちょかませ
subtitles.english: Come on, show them what you've got, and then some more

subtitles.original: ジャンルこちゃ混ぜの Turntable
subtitles.english: A Turntable where all genres are mixed together

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 絶景かな
subtitles.english: Ah, what a magnificent view

subtitles.original: 予測出来ない展開なほど
subtitles.english: The more unpredictable the developments are,

subtitles.original: みんなの心を鷲掴み 華やかに伝播されてハート満たされる
subtitles.english: the more they grab everyone's hearts, spreading vividly and filling them

subtitles.original: 超超超常現象巻き起こせ (Yeah!)
subtitles.english: Cause a super-super-supernatural phenomenon (Yeah!)

subtitles.original: たらればなんていないいないポイ
subtitles.english: Throw away all the "what-ifs" with a poof

subtitles.original: 渾々混沌でも舞い踊れ (Yeah!)
subtitles.english: Dance even through the gushing chaos (Yeah!)

subtitles.english: Entertainment that has everything, jump around

subtitles.english: A festival full of joy, I humbly offer it
